column4: if i install the new nvidia driver for my geforce 4 mx and it doesn't work,can i just reconfigure xserver after to restore everything to normal? [i'm running 7.10]
if i install the new nvidia driver for my geforce 4 mx and it doesn't work,can i just reconfigure xserver after to restore everything to normal? [i'm running 7.10]
it should have made a back up of your xorg.conf file.  You can just rename that as well
well if you are wanting support, I would say synaptic.  But I have used the nVidia latest build before when I want to over clock the card
